meanings.definition: A water sport in which a person is pulled behind a boat while standing on skis.
meanings.sent1: During summer vacation, I tried waterski for the first time and had a blast!
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy watching waterski competitions at the lake.
meanings.sent3: The waterski instructor made learning to balance on skis look easy.
meanings.sent4: Her grace on the waterski was like a swan gliding across the water.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the boat engine roared as she prepared to waterski.

meanings.definition: To participate in the sport of waterskiing.
meanings.sent1: I want to waterski with my friends this weekend at the lake.
meanings.sent2: They often waterski early in the morning when the water is calm.
meanings.sent3: He decided to waterski in his pajamas just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She waterskied through the waves like a pro, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent5: The family planned to waterski together during their beach vacation.
